tool.name: OGS: MoveGeometry
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'MoveGeometry'.
tool.command: for i in $input; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; MoveGeometry #if str($z).strip() != 'None' and str($z).strip() != '': --z '$z' #end if #if str($y).strip() != 'None' and str($y).strip() != '': --y '$y' #end if #if str($x).strip() != 'None' and str($x).strip() != '': --x '$x' #end if --input '$input.element_identifier' --output output_1.gml
tool.help: This tool runs the **MoveGeometry** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
